author: brucem
msg: Our copy of the Jansson library should be strictly internal, but the
autotools build was installing Jansson's include and pkg-config files
along with the Avro library.  Now it doesn't.

msg: [MSITE-488, MSITE-502] attach the original site descriptor as-is, do not interpolate. Interpolation should be done during inheritance.
